subject: Re: Acer TravelMate 4222WLMi
body:
Hi,

On Thu, 24 May 2007, Tim Frink wrote:

> could you successfully install Etch on a 
> Acer TravelMate 4222WLMi (ID LX.TCJ05.016)?
> What are your experiences with that device?
> Thank you.

even if someone owns a similar/same model its a risk. vendors are known to
change the hardware in the models and keep the name the same.

so if you want helpful answers you should provide the list with an component
guide, intel/nvdia/ati? which wlan chipset? which cpu..

of if you can do an 'lspci', there also similar tools for windows so there
isn't even a need to boot linux cd on those machines.

-- 
Florian Reitmeir


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-laptop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
